description: Numbers n such that 2*n! + 1 is a prime.
comments: Used PrimeForm to prove primality for n = 4166 (classical N-1 test). - _David Radcliffe_, May 28 2007
example: n=5 is here because 2*5! + 1 = 241 is a prime.
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 400], PrimeQ[2*#! + 1] &] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 13 2012 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 18 1999
